com.cloudpos.pinpad

Interface PINPadDeviceSpec

  • All Superinterfaces:
    DeviceSpec

    public interface PINPadDeviceSpec
extends DeviceSpec
    The PINPadDeviceSpec interface defines the specification of the PINPad device.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean canGetRandom(int logicalID)
      Whether to support get random.
      boolean canShowText(int logicalID)
      Whether to support show text.
      int getCounts()
      The counts of PINPad device that supports.
      boolean isInternal(int logicalID)
      Whether the device is internal.

    • Method Detail

      • getCounts

        int getCounts()
        The counts of PINPad device that supports.

        Returns:
        count of supports, returns 0 when not support.

      • isInternal

        boolean isInternal(int logicalID)
        Whether the device is internal.

        if true, the system provide the UI of input password.

        Parameters:
        logicalID - default is 1
        Returns:
        true internal PINPad. false External PINPad. Returns false when parameter error or not support.

      • canGetRandom

        boolean canGetRandom(int logicalID)
        Whether to support get random.

        Parameters:
        logicalID - default is 1
        Returns:
        true support. false not support,Returns false when parameter error or not support.

      • canShowText

        boolean canShowText(int logicalID)
        Whether to support show text.

        Parameters:
        logicalID - default is 1
        Returns:
        true support. false not support,Returns false when parameter error or not support.
